bilingual.source: They run a non-commercial community garden.
bilingual.target: 他们经营一个非商业的社区花园。

bilingual.source: The city is known for its commercial district.
bilingual.target: 这座城市以其商业的区而闻名。

bilingual.source: They launched a new commercial on TV last night.
bilingual.target: 他们昨晚在电视上推出了一则新的商业的广告。

bilingual.source: The radio station only plays non-commercial music.
bilingual.target: 这家电台只播放非商业的音乐。

bilingual.source: The event was organized for non-commercial purposes.
bilingual.target: 该活动是为非商业的目的而组织的。

bilingual.source: The commercial success of the product was unexpected.
bilingual.target: 这款产品的商业的成功是出乎意料的。

bilingual.source: She works in the commercial department of the company.
bilingual.target: 她在公司的商业的部门工作。

bilingual.source: The website offers non-commercial educational resources.
bilingual.target: 该网站提供非商业的教育资源。

bilingual.source: The commercial value of the property has increased significantly.
bilingual.target: 该物业的商业的价值显著增加。

bilingual.source: The documentary is strictly non-commercial and aims to raise awareness.
bilingual.target: 这部纪录片严格来说是非商业的，旨在提高意识。

list.abstract: commercial（英[kəˈmɜːʃl]，美[kəˈmɜːrʃl]），英语单词。可做名词或形容词用。做名词时，指电视广告、旅行推销员；做形容词时，指贸易的、商业的。英语短语有commercial broadcasting（商业广播），例句：It flies faster than a commercial jet.（它比商用喷气式飞机飞得快。） 近义词为merchant；反义词为noncommercial。

yingyinNormal.en: And, of course, Facebook isn't just about friends. It's a commercial empire. Almost every company uses it as a marketing tool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且,当然脸书不只是可以用来交友这么简单，而又这还是个商业的王国，几乎每一间公司都用它来推广自己的品牌。

yingyinNormal.en: You really think I... Commercial is over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的觉得我... 广告结束了。

yingyinNormal.en: What's up? I've been thinking about this whole commercial thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？我一直在想这次拍广告的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh. That's a good one. Mine is to pilot a commercial jet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好棒的希望，我是想开大型客机。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, you're crying over a Doritos commercial. I was up for that part.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，那是多力多滋的广告。我有去试镜。

yingyinNormal.en: The commercial? No. That play? No. That other play? No. The movie? Yes. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个广告？不是。那部舞台剧？不是。另一部舞台剧？不是。那部电影。对。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the girls in the satin nighties on the commercial don't seem to think it's that bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 广告上的女孩好像不觉得有这么痛。

yingyinNormal.en: The jellyfish commercial that you wanted. You said they were erotic yet deadly, like women.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要求的水母广告，你说它们情色又致命，和女人一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad? There's a dad in the commercial? Yeah the dad and Ben eat soup and pretend to enjoy it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸？广告里面有爸爸？是啊，班和爸爸喝汤，演得很陶醉的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I mean it. I'm really happy for you. And that's how you get a toothpaste commercial. Cheers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是真心的，我真的很为你高兴，你得这样才能拿下那牙膏广告。干杯。

yingyinNormal.en: Watch something hilarious and you'll only need 4 commercial free sitcoms with consistent laughter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看些搞笑影片，只要看四部无广告的情境喜剧，让你笑个不停，就可燃烧热量。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, because this commercial belongs to me and Mitch. Your kid's name is Raymond. Yeah? So is yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啊，这支广告片的主角非我和米契莫属。你的孩子叫做雷蒙。对，你的也是！

yingyinNormal.en: But I can't stay too long, I gotta get up early for a commercial audition tomorrow and I gotta look good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能待太晚，我要早起去试镜，精神必须要好。

yingyinNormal.en: I do think we're at the dawn of a new space era and it's one where commercial companies play a stronger role.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为我们处在一个新太空时代的开端，这个时代商业公司将发挥更大的作用。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sitting it out this year. The whole holiday's gotten laughably commercial. Sounds like Amy turned you down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年我不打算采取行动，这个节日已经商业化到可笑的地步了。看来你被艾米拒绝了。

yingyinNormal.en: I got the hemorrhoid commercial! I start Monday! What about Nebraska? Oh, hell with Nebraska. I'm gonna be a star!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我接了个痔疮广告，周一开拍。那内布拉斯加呢？鬼才回内布拉斯加，姐要当明星啦！

yingyinNormal.en: Not now, Maya. It has to be right now, dad. We have one more very important campaign commercial that everybody needs to see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛雅，待会再说。刻不容缓啊，老爸。我们有个很重要的竞选广告大家得看看。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Ross, if Ben gets this commercial, do you think you can get me some free soup? Chandler, a can of soup is like 60 cents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果班拿到广告演出机会，你能帮我弄些免费的汤吗？钱德，一罐汤才60美分。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, after four years of acting lessons and waiting tables, I've done a hemorrhoid commercial and a production of Anne Frank above a bowling alley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过上了四年的表演课当了四年服务员之后，我出演了一个痔疮广告和一个保龄球球道上面扮演过安妮·弗兰克。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Crop-growing in the UK is restricted due to its <highlight>commercial</highlight> interests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于商业利益，英国的农作物种植受到限制。

examination_example.sentence: Stay away from <highlight>commercial</highlight> advertisers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 远离商业广告客户。

examination_example.sentence: Most people do not realise that there are strong <highlight>commercial</highlight> agendas at work to keep them in passive consumption mode.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人没有意识到有强大的商业议程在起作用，让他们处于被动消费模式。

sense_info_list.en: making or intended to make a profit

examination_example.sentence: Most of its terrain doesn't have the right soil or climate to grow crops on a <highlight>commercial</highlight> basis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的大部分地形没有合适的土壤或气候来种植商业作物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使…商业化；使商品化；利用…赚钱；在… 发展商业；为利润而降低…质量
adj. 贸易的；商业的；商务的；获利的；营利的；用作商品的；由广告收入资助的；大量供应且纯度不高的；商品化的；以获利为主要目的的

sense_info_list.en: concerned with or engaged in commerce

examination_example.sentence: Legally, a person's rights to control the <highlight>commercial</highlight> use of their name and image beyond their death differ between and even within countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从法律上讲，一个人在死后控制其姓名和形象的商业用途的权利在各国之间甚至在国内都是不同的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Commercial</highlight> growing fields are astronomically huge and take thousands of man-hours to operate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商业发展领域好比是天文数字，需要大量的时间去运作。

sense_info_list.zh: 商业广告; 靠广告收入维持的

examination_example.sentence: Marconi disapproved of the use of wireless communication for <highlight>commercial</highlight> broadcasting.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
马可尼不赞成将无线通信用于商业 
广播。

examination_example.sentence: There are some who say Marconi lost his edge when <highlight>commercial</highlight> broadcasting came along.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人说，当商业广播出现时，Marconi就失去了他的优势。

examination_example.sentence: Later, Audrey Hepburn was digitally recreated for a chocolate <highlight>commercial</highlight> in 2013.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，奥黛丽赫本在2013年为一则巧克力广告进行了数字重现。

sense_info_list.en: making or intended to make a profit
sense_info_list.zh: 商业化的; 盈利性的

examination_example.sentence: The hope is that it will help standardize a set of norms in the dawning <highlight>commercial</highlight> spaceflight industry throughout the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希望它将有助于标准化全球新兴的商业太空飞行行业的一系列规范。

sense_info_list.en: concerned with or engaged in commerce

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Commercial</highlight> hunting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商业狩猎。

examination_example.sentence: The whale population has become endangered due to <highlight>commercial</highlight> whaling activities in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，由于商业捕鲸活动，鲸鱼种群已濒临灭绝。

sense_info_list.en: making or intended to make a profit
sense_info_list.zh: 商业化的; 盈利性的

examination_example.sentence: And in such great numbers, their <highlight>commercial</highlight> hunting of ducks and geese became an industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数量如此之多，他们对鸭子和鹅的商业捕猎成为了一项产业。

examination_example.sentence: Why is there no <highlight>commercial</highlight> farming of ducks and geese in Western countries?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么西方国家没有商业化的鸭子和鹅养殖?

examination_example.sentence: Yet, there's no <highlight>commercial</highlight> farming of these birds nowadays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这些鸟现在没有商业养殖。

sense_info_list.zh: 商业广告; 靠广告收入维持的

examination_example.sentence: In contrast, California, home of Silicon Valley, recently proposed far more restrictive rules that would require human drivers be ready to take the wheel, and <highlight>commercial</highlight> use of self-driving technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，硅谷所在州加利福尼亚州最近提出了限制性更强的规则，要求驾驶员做好驾驶准备，并在商业上使用自动驾驶技术。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使…商业化；使商品化；利用…赚钱；在… 发展商业；为利润而降低…质量
adj. 贸易的；商业的；商务的；获利的；营利的；用作商品的；由广告收入资助的；大量供应且纯度不高的；商品化的；以获利为主要目的的

word_family.mean: n. 贸易；商业；社交；交往；性交

sense_info_list.en: concerned with or engaged in commerce

examination_example.sentence: Yet the demand is there, with UneeQ seeing high adoption of its digital employees across the financial, health care, and <highlight>commercial</highlight> sectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，需求是存在的，UneeQ发现其数字员工在金融、医疗保健和商业部门的使用率都很高。

examination_example.sentence: Art products differ from most other <highlight>commercial</highlight> products because they have both <highlight>commercial</highlight> and cultural values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术产品不同于其他大多数商业产品，因为艺术产品兼具商业价值和文化价值。

examination_example.sentence: One day, I saw a <highlight>commercial</highlight> for a health-care company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天，我看到一家医疗保健公司的广告。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: concerned with or engaged in commerce

examination_example.sentence: Banned <highlight>commercial</highlight> logging.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止商业伐木。

examination_example.sentence: It has also used strict forest protection methods and banned (禁止) all <highlight>commercial</highlight> logging (商业伐木) since last August.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自去年8月以来，中国还采取了严格的森林保护措施，禁止所有商业采伐。

examination_example.sentence: The Hill family owned the rights to the melody and had to be paid every time the song was part of a <highlight>commercial</highlight>（商业的） production．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希尔家族拥有这首歌的版权，每次这首歌被纳入商业制作时，他们都要付费。
